name: Juvenile Jade
desc:
A crystalline substance taken from a Primo Geovishap. Within it is contained the potential to become a dragon.
These dull crystals are precipitated within the bodies of vishaps sleeping in the mountains. Liyue folklore holds that they will gather power over many years, after which this crystal will, at last, replace their original heart, and the vishap will become a true dragon — one that can shake the mountains and split the earth.

customize.name: Primo Geovishap
customize.desc:
After many years, the awesomely powerful Primo Geovishaps grow accustomed to changes in their elemental environment.
Folktales hold that after the great "draconic calamity" that led to the ruination of Tianqiu Valley, the overlord of the Geovishaps and Primo Geovishaps was imprisoned deep beneath the earth, and so too did they burrow into deep and unseen places, awaiting their chance to rise once more...

customize.name: Hu Tao
customize.desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.name: Yanfei
customize.desc: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.
